"ヴォル・ドラゴンの牙の調達":
"<%me>, just who I wanted to see!
The Vol Dragon sautee' went over big.
One dish is not enough though! My
culinary creativity cannot be stopped!

My next entry is going to be a boiled
Vol Dragon dish, but I need the fangs
for seasoning. Get me some, post haste!

※Cae de Nv.24+ Vol Dragons."
